original_text: But since we left off to burn incense to the queen of heaven, and to pour out drink offerings unto her, we have wanted all things, and have been consumed by the sword and by the famine.
korean_text: 우리가 하늘의 여왕에게 분향하고 그 앞에 전제 드리던 것을 폐한 후부터는 모든 것이 궁핍하고 칼과 기근에 멸망을 당하였느니라 하며

sentences.original_text: But since we left off to burn incense
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 우리가 향을 사르는 것을 그만 둔 이래로

sentences.original_text: and to pour out drink offerings unto her
and have been consumed by the sword
